name: Magister
appearance: Short, powerfully built, with cobalt-stained beard braids and mirrored sky-ore goggles perpetually perched on his brow.
character: Brilliant, impatient, and allergic to superstition.
talents: Hears harmonic faults in machinery at a glance
Runs the Loom by touch alone in blackout
dreams: Decouple the Loom of Tides from politics
Prove the Blue Heart crystal exists
Build storm-quieter towers across the valley
secrets: Operates an unauthorized resonance chamber that syncs to the Shattermere on thin moons
Accidentally woke a gargoyle while testing water-feed on the Aqueduct
